description:
Welcome to Shahid – Your Ultimate Entertainment Destination

Dive into the world of endless entertainment with Shahid, the leading platform for the best Arabic Originals, exclusive series, blockbuster movies, live TV, sports, and so much more. Whether you’re watching for free or subscribing to one of Shahid’s packages, you’ll gain unlimited access to a world of premium content tailored just for you.

Why Choose Shahid?

Exclusive Arabic Originals

Enjoy the finest Arabic Original productions available exclusively on Shahid. From gripping dramas to captivating comedies, we bring you stories that resonate with your heart.

Live Sports in HD

Catch the thrill of the biggest international sports and regional tournaments, all in stunning HD (Available in MENA region only.)

Unmissable Live Events

Stay entertained with iconic events like Riyadh Season, Jeddah Season, live concerts, and theatrical plays.

Ad-Free Streaming

Enjoy uninterrupted, non-stop entertainment when you subscribe. Say goodbye to ads and hello to seamless viewing.

Live TV Channels

Watch your favorite channels in crystal-clear Full HD and stay on top of the latest news, entertainment, and more.

Exclusive Movie & Series Premieres

Be the first to watch the latest series and movies before they hit TV or cinemas.

A World of Genres

From heart-pounding horror and thrilling dramas to laugh-out-loud comedies and enchanting romance, Shahid’s vast library has something for everyone. Explore Egyptian classics, Turkish sensations, and captivating foreign series at your fingertips.

Family-Friendly Content

Secure profiles and exclusive kids’ content ensure entertainment for all ages in a safe and dedicated environment.

Features You’ll Love

Create Personalized Profiles: Assign unique profiles to each family member for a tailored viewing experience.

Build Your Watchlist: Save your favorite shows and movies for easy access anytime.

Download & Watch Offline: Take your entertainment on the go by downloading content to watch without an internet connection.

Why Shahid is Perfect for You

A constantly updated media library keeps you up-to-date with the latest blockbusters and trending series.

Instant access to a global selection of TV favorites, tailored for you.

Effortlessly browse curated categories for every mood and preference.

Personalized recommendations and updates so you never miss a thing.

Download the Shahid app now and explore our unlimited benefits and perks. Immerse yourself in a world of award-winning movies, trending series, and captivating live events—all in ultimate quality and comfort. Once you start, you’ll be hooked.

Enjoy access to the best movies, series, and live entertainment awaits—don’t miss out!

 

Privacy Policy: https://www.mbc.net/en/privacy-policy

Terms of Use: https://shahid.mbc.net/ar/terms-and-conditions

Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose between a one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

Note: 
If you subscribe via Apple, payment will be charged to App Store Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of Service —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/privacy-policy

What makes 'Joy Awards' truly special, as it does every year, is that the winners are chosen by the fans who love and cherish them. With the 'Joy Awards' App, it's you who will nominate and vote for your beloved stars and releases in Music, Cinema, Series, Directors, Sports, and Influencers, all for free!



You will nominate and cast your votes in two phases:




First Phase: Nominating Your Favorite Stars and Releases
In the nomination phase, which lasts for one month, you play a crucial role in shaping the competition. 
Here's where YOU come in – choose your favorite nominee from the names or titles listed in each category. If your top pick isn't there, don't worry! You have the chance to add your own favorite name or title, as long as it meets the terms and conditions: it should be a release or achievement from 2025. 
During the nomination phase, you can nominate only once for each category.
This phase eventually leads to the selection of the top four final nominees in each category, representing the stars and releases with the most nominations.
 
Second Phase: Voting for Your Favorite Stars and Releases
After the nominations have been counted, the voting phase begins with the top four nominees in each category, which also spans one month.
Here's where YOU make the difference – cast your votes for your favorite nominees. 
And a month later, the voting counts are gathered, leading to the grand reveal of the winners during the live "Joy Awards 2026" ceremony in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
During the voting phase, you can vote only once for each category.

Dive into ShortMax, the prime video app for short dramas, movies, and reels! Perfect for quick breaks, commutes, or late-night binge sessions, our app delivers engaging stories in minutes.
Step into the realm of ShortMax, where an array of engaging short dramas and movies awaits your exploration. Immerse yourself in a diverse range of episodes and elevate your drama experience to new heights.
Indulge in a Tapestry of Genres
With ShortMax, you'll relish an assortment of genres spanning drama, romance, suspense, and thrilling mysteries. Embark on time-travel adventures, unravel enigmatic cases, or get swept away in the fantasy of romance with a pretend billionaire. Our collection of stories is as vast as your imagination!
Lose Yourself in Miniature Dramas
In just minutes, you'll be completely absorbed in these enthralling short narratives, igniting your passion for drama like never before.
Unveiling Exclusive Selection
ShortMax proudly presents a meticulously curated assortment of short plays. Each episode is carefully crafted, brimming with creativity, emotion, and depth, designed to transport you effortlessly into a multitude of imaginative realms.
Here's What Awaits You on ShortMax:
- An Array of Genres
From inspirational comebacks to enigmatic time-travel adventures, from the allure of ancient tales to modern love stories, ShortMax caters to every drama preference you desire.
- Tailored Recommendations
Our smart recommendation system ensures you easily find shows tailored to your tastes.
- Effortless Viewing Experience
With each short drama lasting just minutes, you can seamlessly enjoy them during your commute, breaks, or moments of leisure.
- Exclusive Original Content
Engage with bite-sized, drama-packed original shows that will keep you coming back for more. The entertainment never stops!
- Always Fresh
Stay up-to-date with real-time updates, ensuring a steady stream of the hottest short dramas and movies. Discover new favorites every week!
- Offline Download
Enjoy your downloaded content anytime, anywhere, even when you're offline.
- Your One-Stop Platform
ShortMax simplifies your viewing journey by providing a unified platform, eliminating the inconvenience of switching between sources.
- Visual Brilliance
Delight in high-definition visuals that capture every detail, creating an immersive feast for your eyes.
Embrace ShortMax as your gateway to the world of short dramas and movies, where limitless possibilities await. Download now and embark on an exhilarating journey through a universe of captivating short dramas, immersing yourself in the drama-watching experience!

Platinumlist is a platform trusted by millions of people. With over 12 years in the entertainment industry, we know what it means to truly enjoy and have a great time. Platinumlist is built with you in mind.

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

webook.com is Saudi Arabia’s ultimate super-app for entertainment, travel, and lifestyle. It is the one-stop platform to discover and book concerts, sporting events, cultural shows, flights, hotels, restaurants, memorabilia, auctions, and more. Whether you are in Riyadh, Jeddah, the Eastern Province, or anywhere else in the Kingdom, webook.com connects you to everything exciting. With updated listings, verified bookings, and a simple interface, having fun and planning trips has never been easier.

Events & Tickets: Book tickets for concerts, festivals, sports matches, comedy shows, exhibitions, and cultural events across Saudi Arabia. From headline concerts at Riyadh Season and football games in the Roshn Saudi League to family attractions in Jeddah or workshops in Dammam, if you can book it, it is here. Follow artists, athletes, and venues to get notifications on new events. All tickets are official with no markups, and you can resell securely if plans change. Skip scalpers and queues – your tickets live safely on your phone, ready to scan at the gate.

Flights & Hotels: Plan your travel with ease. Book flights with top airlines, compare schedules, and reserve hotels or resorts at great rates through our partner almosafer. Whether flying Riyadh–Dubai, a business trip to Jeddah, or a weekend staycation in Abha, webook.com makes it simple. Filter by price, rating, or location. Choose luxury resorts, city hotels, or budget stays – all with secure payments and instant confirmation. With integrated flights and hotels search, planning your trip has never been smoother.

Restaurants & Dining: Turn outings into complete experiences by reserving tables at top restaurants. Discover Saudi Arabia’s best dining, from fine dining in Riyadh to cafés in Jeddah and trendy spots in Khobar. With integration from Servme, when you book a concert or football match you will get recommendations for nearby restaurants. Pair your event with the right meal – a romantic dinner, family lunch, or casual hangout. Book events and restaurants together in one app.

Shop & Auctions: For fans of sports, music, and culture, webook.com offers a memorabilia shop and exclusive auctions in one place. Browse and buy signed jerseys, autographed posters, and official souvenirs from your favorite teams and artists. Join live or timed auctions to bid on rare items, luxury goods, and collectibles you will not find elsewhere. During select events, take part in real-time auctions for unique pieces such as signed guitars or rare football boots. All memorabilia is verified authentic, and every auction is secure and transparent, giving you confidence as a buyer or collector.

Why webook.com?

All-in-One Platform: Tickets, flights, hotels, restaurants, memorabilia, and auctions in one app.

Trusted by Millions: Millions of users in Saudi Arabia already use webook.com.

Official Partnerships: Authorized ticketing partner for major events, including Roshn Saudi League matches.

Personalized Discovery: Recommendations based on your interests and bookings.

Secure Payments: Options like Mada, Apple Pay, credit cards, with instant confirmation.

24/7 Support: Multilingual service in Arabic and English.

From massive concerts in Riyadh to luxury dining in Jeddah, from football in Dammam to rare collectibles through auctions, webook.com is the super-app that brings it all together.

Download webook.com – fun things to do today and unlock a world of entertainment, travel, dining, shopping, and more. Discover new experiences, book what you love, and make memories with a few taps. From concerts in Riyadh to flights for your next holiday, restaurants in Jeddah to memorabilia and auctions, webook.com has it all. Having fun has never been this simple – everything you need is in one app.

Your next adventure starts here. With webook.com, you will never miss the experiences that matter most.

لماذا عجلة؟

نحن لسنا مجرد تطبيق تتبع عادي. نحن رحلتك الرومانسية في عالم الدراما، حيث كل فيلم قصة حب، وكل مسلسل مغامرة عاطفية. دع عجلة تقودك لاكتشاف دراما تلامس قلبك!

حمّل التطبيق الآن وابدأ رحلتك في عالم السينمائي!

اكتشف تجربة مشاهدة متكاملة مع تطبيق قصة عشق، المنصة العربية العصرية التي تجمع بين التكنولوجيا الذكية والمحتوى الغني لتلبية شغف عشاق السينما والتلفاز. بفضل تصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام، يوفّر لك التطبيق قصه عشق مسلسلات تركيه كل ما تحتاجه لاستكشاف أحدث وأشهر الأعمال من تركيا، الوطن العربي، آسيا، والعالم أجمع.

أبرز المزايا:
استكشاف المحتوى بسهولة: تصفّح أحدث الأفلام والمسلسلات العربية، التركية، مسلسلات كورية، والآسيوية، مترجمة ومدبلجة بجودة عالية.

توصيات ذكية: يقدّم لك التطبيق اقتراحات مخصصة تناسب ذوقك بناءً على تفاعلاتك.

تقييمات ومراجعات: اطّلع على آراء المستخدمين، شارك تقييماتك، وتعرّف على أفضل الأعمال.

تصنيفات متنوعة: أكشن، دراما، كوميديا، أنيميشن، عائلي، والكثير من التصنيفات التي تناسب جميع الأذواق.

دليل شامل للمحتوى الرمضاني والعربي: معلومات محدثة حول أبرز مسلسلات رمضان والأعمال الكلاسيكية والمعاصرة.

قائمة مشاهداتي: أنشئ قائمة خاصة بك لتتبع ما شاهدته وما ترغب بمشاهدته لاحقًا.

تنويه هام:

تطبيق موقع قصة عشق مخصص لاستعراض وتصفح معلومات الأفلام والمسلسلات فقط. وجميع الحقوق محفوظة لأصحابها الأصليين.
تم تصميم التطبيق بهدف تقديم معلومات محدثة وشاملة حول الأعمال السينمائية والتلفزيونية الجديدة والكلاسيكية من مصادر متنوعة وموثوقة.

Who's the imposter among your friends?
Imposter is the ultimate party game of bluffing, guessing, and social deduction. Grab 3-5 friends, sit around one device, and find out who’s lying.

How to Play:
1- All players see the same secret word—except one.
2- The imposter only sees the word “Imposter.”
3- One by one, players say a word related to the secret word.
4- The imposter must fake it and try to blend in without knowing the word.
5- Keep giving words and talking until someone thinks they've figured it out.

Fun, fast, and full of suspicion—perfect for game nights, road trips, or hanging out with friends.

Features:
- Play locally with 3 to 15 friends
- 10+ categories like food, movies, jobs, and more
- 500+ unique words and growing
- No accounts, no setup—just start playing
- Great for all ages—kids, teens, and adults

Built for laughs, bluffing, and epic "aha!" moments

Download now and start your next Imposter showdown!
